localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

4fun is a simple yet super fun game for all ages. To play just drag them in their right direction, collect coins and buy upgrades!

Features
- Simples to play, hard to master!
- Nice graphics and gameplay!
- Upgrades and Level Up!
- Ranking: compete with your frinds!

About Café Game Studio
Café Game Studio is a brazilian independent game studio that makes nice games for everybody (includind us)!

Package size: 74 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Cafe Game Studio

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
